title: Accept signature
name: acceptSignature
description: A signatureRequired event is invoked during transaction when signature verification is needed (f.ex when payment is done with a magstripe card). The merchant is required to ask the cardholder for signature and approve (or disapprove) the signature. signatureRequired tells the card reader if the signature was approved by passing YES. To disapprove then NO is passed.

parameters.name: flag
parameters.notes: YES if signature is valid, NO otherwise

elements.name: responseStatus
elements.description: Invoked while during transaction with different statuses from card reader

elements.name: responseError
elements.description: Invoked to inform when an error response happens.

elements.name: responseFinanceStatus
elements.description: Invoked when the card reader finishes processing the transaction
